attributes.action: act against proposals to introduce a carbon tax on barbecues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed "carbon offset" tax that county councils would be allowed to levy against barbecues should not be allowed for 4 reasons: 
1. Neither the principle nor the practice of carbon offsetting has been conclusively shown to be effective 
2. There is no guarantee that the cash raised will not be environmentally ringfenced
3. A barbecue is a simple and innocent pleasure which should not be ruined by financial penalty
4. The carbon saved is minimal as the food will simply end up being cooked in the kitchen: a process that generates CO2 anyway
